mapper.select: select ord.order_id as orderId, ord.owner_of_cargo as ownerOfCargo, cargo.cargo_name as cargoName, ord.order_date as orderDate, ord.driver_cost as driverCost, ord.china_cost as chinaCost, ord.korea_cost as koreaCost, ord.freight, ord.order_car as orderCar, ord.profit, ord.quarantine_cost as quarantineCost, con.consignor_name as consignorName, ord.order_car_number as orderCarNumber, ord.order_type as orderType from order_list ord left join car_list car on ord.order_car=car.car_id left join consignor_list con on ord.owner_of_cargo=con.consignor_id left join cargo_list cargo on ord.cargo_name=cargo.cargo_id
